name: AI-Text-Summarizer
desc: Summarizes long text into concise summaries using advanced AI models. Helps users quickly understand large documents or articles.

name: ML Seat Allotment
desc: Automates and optimizes the seat allotment process using machine learning for fair and efficient allocation in academic institutions.

name: Events Hub
desc: A central platform listing upcoming hackathons and cultural events from various colleges, fostering connections and campus promotion.

name: PermitEase - College Permission App
desc: App for managing internal permissions in colleges, allowing digital submission, tracking, and management of requests for efficient review.

name: Fast Cart - Smart Billing Interface
desc: Developed a Flutter app that saves time by self-billing goods. It integrates UPI services to provide quick payments and reduces the need for human intervention, hence increasing shopping efficiency.
